title: Retro fonts in Gentlemen Broncos (2009) title sequence
content:
anyone can name these fonts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928im_/http:/typophile.com/files/broncos_5042.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [broncos.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928/http:/typophile.com/files/broncos.jpg) | 262.74 KB |
author: Phillip Rodolfi

comments.content:
Here's 4 maybe names:

1. A Jared: FontMesa-Michael Hagemann/CorleoneDue

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ajared1_3792.jpg)

4. JOSH PAIS: Shimojima, Masato/Cliperbold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ajosh1_3968.jpg)

6. jemaine: Soft Hits by Cathy Davies  
 [http://www.dafont.com/cathy-davies.d94?text=.+jemaine+](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928/http:/www.dafont.com/cathy-davies.d94?text=.+jemaine+ "http://www.dafont.com/cathy-davies.d94?text=.+jemaine+").

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928im_/http:/typophile.com/files/6jem1_6450.jpg)

10. yuka ruell: ShyFonts Type Foundry/SFGrandezza-Medium

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10yuka1_5680.jpg)

It would have been better to have split this post into separate requests.  
09 is Albertus [http://www.myfonts.com/search/albertus/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/albertus/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/albertus/fonts/")  
Don

10 SF Grandezza Medium [http://www.dafont.com/sf-grandezza.font?text=film+editor+yuka+ruel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928/http:/www.dafont.com/sf-grandezza.font?text=film+editor+yuka+ruel "http://www.dafont.com/sf-grandezza.font?text=film+editor+yuka+ruel")  
Looks like an edit of Microgramma /Eurostyle  
Don  
Update: I see that Dick Pape already spotted this one.

02 Not 100%, but close. Station No. One [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimmy/station/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimmy/station/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimmy/station/")  
Volcano Gothic Inline [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/volcano/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829133928/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/volcano/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/volcano/")  
Don
